name: Elder Varric

visualDescription.body: Stooped with age but still sturdy
visualDescription.visibleClothing: Heavy woolen robes with embedded crystals that glow faintly
visualDescription.condition: Elderly, with a long white beard and weathered hands

personality.temperament: Wise and contemplative, but now worried and urgent
personality.traits: Patient, knowledgeable about local lore, protective of the village
personality.motivations: To protect Emberhold and recover the Ember Crystal before winter
personality.fears: That the village will not survive without the crystal's warmth
secrets: He knows more about who might have taken the crystal than he initially reveals
He was once a powerful elemental binder in his youth

backstory: Varric has been the elder of Emberhold for over three decades. In his youth, he was a talented elemental binder who helped maintain the connection between the Ember Crystal and the village's heating systems. He has deep knowledge of the crystal's origins and powers, passed down through generations of village elders.
currentGoal: To organize the search for the missing Ember Crystal

inventory.name: Village Elder's Staff
inventory.description: A gnarled wooden staff with a small blue crystal embedded at the top

inventory.name: Ancient Key
inventory.description: A heavy iron key that unlocks the ceremonial chamber in the Crystal Caverns
